flawed_nl_solution:
If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=160>>160 books.
In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 160*5 = 80 books which is the number he has now.
This means Evan will have 80+60 = <<80+60=140>>140 books in five years.
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 80. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
